an3.39:1.4: akāsikaṃ candanaṃ dhāremi → kāsikaṃ candanaṃ dhāremi (s1-3, km, mr) | akāsikaṃ dhāremi (?)
an3.39:1.5: pana me su taṃ → panassu me taṃ (bj) | pana su me taṃ (s1-3, pts1)
an3.39:2.2: paricārayamāno → paricāriyamāno (bj, s1-3, km, mr) | parivāriyamāno (pts1)
an3.39:11.2: Nekkhamme daṭṭhu khemataṃ → nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato (si, s1-3, pts1)
